start.description: Dave finds himself floating in space, wondering what to do next.

fight.description: Dave faces a giant Space Seagull! It squawks: 'You will never stop my seagull army!'

choices.text: Blast it with the Banana Blaster

search.description: Dave finds space dust. A message pops up: 'No chill crystals here!'

end1.description: The Space Seagull explodes into cosmic feathers.

end2.description: The seagull mocks you, but you live. Congrats?

end3.description: You give up. That's okay. Space is hard.

end4.description: You find the elusive Chill Crystals! Rad.

end5.description: Dave wakes up... stickier than before.
